t_audio_discussion_question_2::text_card: You may want to substitute the name of the issue you are focused on where you see \“the issue.\”
t_audio_discussion_question_2::clip_card: What do you think should be done about the issue?
t_audio_discussion_question_2::text_card: Discussions are framed around asking many people the same question. This template investigates what can be done about a specific issue. Discussions work well for investigating issues with a strong cultural or social significance. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
